content: उपमर्दः {@--1@} Friction, rubbing or pressing down, crushing under one's weight; अन्यासु तावदुपमर्दसहासु भृंग लोलं विनोदय मनः सुमनोलतासु <ls>S. D.</ls> (where उ° also means rough handling or enjoyment). {@--2@} Destruction, injury, killing. {@--3@} Reproach, abuse, insult, harsh or insulting treatment; <ls>Mk. 1.</ls> {@--4@} Unhusking. {@--5@} Refutation of a charge. {@--6@} Stirring, shaking.
